structure.unit: Powers And Duties Of Cities And Towns

law.catch_line: Public Notice Of Request For Proposal
law.text: [ Text of section added by 2012, 256, Sec. 1 effective November 20, 2012.] Public notice of the request for proposals shall be published in the central register pursuant to section 20A of chapter 9 at least 30 days before the time specified for receipt of proposals in the request for proposals.
